sentences.sContent: They are working together to benefit the whole community.
sentences.sCn: 他们在为整个社区的利益共同努力。

sentences.sContent: ...adults can benefit from using language not just to communicate...
...the big benefit will not only be in the housing of this enormous and rapidly growing amount of data...
...What benefit does the woman say their firm can get by sponsoring the South Theater Company...
...Environmental protection and improvement benefit people all over the world...
...All the plans would have to provide standard benefit packages that would be easy to compare...
...Students do not merely benefit while at university...
...and to reduce them with the benefit of hard-won experience...
...boys benefit even more than girls from having larger numbers of female classmates...
...we believe that the greater body of evidence shows that school-sponsored sports programs appear to benefit students...
...In what way do the media benefit from extreme weather...

phrases.pCn: 得益于；得利于；因…而得到好处
有资格得到救济金(或补助费、抚恤金、保险金)
假定其无过失或无罪（因无充分证据证明某人有罪）；裁判员对可疑情况无把握时不对有关运动员作不利判定
福利制度；职工福利制度
附加利益；额外利益；附加利益（人身保险）

remMethod.val: bene(善， 好) ＋ fit → 利益

words.tran: 有益的，有利的；可享利益的
良性的；仁慈的；有益的；和蔼的
受益地；获利地；有使用权地
[金融] 受益人，受惠者；封臣

trans.tranOther: if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way

trans.tranCn: 利益，恩惠；救济金，保险金，津贴
trans.tranOther: money provided by the government to people who are sick, unemployed, or have little money
if you benefit from something, or it benefits you, it gives you an advantage, improves your life, or helps you in some way
